label: 後七日御修法部類
本: Jewel in the Ashes: Buddha Relics and Power in Early Medieval Japan . Harvard University Asia Center . 2000
見出し読み: ごしちにちみしほぶるい
説明文: Anonymous work (ca. 1137) that includes records of the implements used as well as monks participating in the Latter Seven-Day Rite from 1114 to 1137.
